sentences.en: Information about the job market can be a lifeline for those who are out of work.
sentences.cn: 有关就业市场的信息可能就是失业者的生命线。

sentences.en: Click the diagram frame and drag it to the lifeline.
sentences.cn: 点击这个图框并将它拖拽到生命线。

sentences.en: People count on hospitals and health facilities to respond, swiftly and efficiently, as the lifeline for survival and the backbone of support.
sentences.cn: 人们指望医院和卫生机构作为生存的命脉和提供支持的栋梁，迅速而有效地作出回应。
